property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The darkness crawls with vampires and ghouls, but we are not without allies." - Mikaeus, the Lunarch

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, return target Spirit card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She endures without Avacyn but secretly asks each soul she guides if it has seen her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As long as you control a Human, Angelic Overseer has hexproof and is indestructible.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From mortal hope immortal power springs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Moorlanders speak in awe of the priests' talent for arriving just in time to drive off the wicked things that prowl the ravished parish.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's a Human. Otherwise, it can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What cannot be destroyed will be bound." - Oath of Avacyn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of the Parish.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I stand for every cobbler, tanner, and fool in this town - and they stand for me."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death has bound it with chains of past regrets. Forever it searches for atonement, each kindness removing a single link.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Flying As long as Dearly Departed is in your graveyard, each Human creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never forget our ancestors. They have not forgotten us." - Mikaeus, the Lunarch

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player chooses a creature he or she controls. Destroy the rest. Flashback {5}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Doomed Traveler dies, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Elder Cathar dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. If that creature is a Human, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My greatest hope is that you will surpass me in every way, consigning my name to some forgotten corner of history."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, vigilance Protection from Vampires, from Werewolves, and from Zombies

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No matter how many I kill, there are always more to hunt. It makes me smile just to think about it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap up to two target creatures. Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: People only say "I'm sure it was nothing" when they're sure it was something.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature. When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Other Spirit creatures you control get +0/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spirit cares nothing for the crimes or triumphs of the slain. It shelters all beneath its stormy cloak.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Geist-Honored Monk's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control. When Geist-Honored Monk enters the battlefield, put two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In life, they were a motley crew: farmers, lords, cutpurses, priests. In death, they are united in singular, benevolent purpose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Mausoleum Guard dies, put two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ghoulcallers trying to get in, geists trying to get out . . . . This duty is never dull."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In these halls there is no pass or fail. Your true test comes with the first full moon."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The path back to the world of the living is murky and bewildering. A geist may not even realize that it's terrifying its own loved ones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mikaeus, the Lunarch enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mikaeus. {T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Mikaeus: Put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My faith is stronger than fang, claw, or mindless hunger."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Nevermore enters the battlefield, name a nonland card. The named card can't be cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By the law of Avacyn, the following thoughts, words, and deeds are henceforth disallowed."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all enchantments. You gain 1 life for each enchantment destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Moonlight has a way of showing all things as they truly are - for better or for worse." - Zilla of Lambholt

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target card from a graveyard. Flashback {W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some priests speak in whispers of the Helvault, a silver prison of unpurged evils.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you must go out at night, bring a mob." - Master of the Elgaud Cathars

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No one chooses to be stitched together into a skaab. If it could speak, it would beg for its own destruction." - Thalia, Knight-Cathar

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}, Sacrifice Selfless Cathar: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I fail to offer myself, we will surely be overrun. My fate would be the same."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}, Sacrifice Silverchase Fox: Exile target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be careful in your hunt. The clever little creature can steal your wards and lead you right into the werewolf's den." - Britta, midwife of Gatstaf

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Slayer of the Wicked enters the battlefield, you may destroy target Vampire, Werewolf, or Zombie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You don't want to see his trophy room.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though the old holy wards and roadside shrines have begun to fail, faith in Avacyn still holds true power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control gain protection from non-Human creatures until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As long as we can utter a prayer or lift a weapon, we have the power to fight back." - Thalia, Knight-Cathar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Never a word. Never a warning. Only the sound of hoofbeats along the crossways, and the screams of the avenged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Activated abilities of artifacts can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Let moss grow over gargoyles - Gavony saying meaning "forget painful memories"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've learned to trust my dogs' instincts. When they're calm, I'm calm. And when they get nervous, I get my crossbow." - Hinrik of House Cecani

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever another creature you control dies, you may transform Thraben Sentry. // Trample

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Unruly Mob.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who says werewolves are the only ones who can hunt as a pack?" - Kolman, elder of Gatstaf

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To show geists pity is to prolong their agonies. Whether they know it or not, they seek the Blessed Sleep, and we are to give it to them." - Mikaeus, the Lunarch

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Village Bell-Ringer enters the battlefield, untap all creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Priests, hunters, slayers - to arms! The enemy approaches!"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd rather take on a neckbiter or moonhowler any day. Oh well, looks like I'm going to end up parrying with empty air half the night." - Saint Trogen, the Slayer

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Armored Skaab enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile a creature card from your graveyard and pay its mana cost: Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Innistrad, death is just a career change.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Other Spirit creatures you control get +1/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not content to nudge vases and chill drawing rooms, some geists muster spectral armies to claw at the hearts of the living.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of target creature you control. Flashback {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Surely you know the joy of the hunt, my furry friend. My kind of hunt just takes a different form than yours."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After seeing his life's work drip away, the mage decided it was a good time to go crazy.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {T}, Put the top card of your library into your graveyard: Add {1} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Garl, adjust the slurry dispensers. Garl, fetch more corpses. Garl, quit crying and give me your brain tissue. If he doesn't stop being so rude, I'm quitting."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This abomination never belonged in our world. I'm merely setting it free." - Dierk, geistmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unbreakable and unappetizing, the crab grows uninterrupted, sometimes to the size of a cottage and beyond.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. That player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whether he actually exists is in question, but the terror she feels is excruciatingly real.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature on top of its owner's library. Flashback {7}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures your opponents control get -4/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The panic is amusing, but the real fun comes when the spell passes and the villagers start looking for a scapegoat." - Ludevic, necro-alchemist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Invisible Stalker is unblockable.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All that concerns me is the vampires' sense of smell and those freezing Nephalian nights."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His mind whirled with grand plans, never thinking of what might happen if he were to succeed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {U}: Return Lantern Spirit to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bound to the square where she died, she calls out to those in danger - usually scaring them straight into the peril she warns of.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The secrets she carried could have saved many lives, but they quietly drowned with her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {1}{U}: Put a hatchling counter on Ludevic's Test Subject. Then if there are five or more hatchling counters on it, remove all of them and transform it. // Trample

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Makeshift Mauler, exile a creature card from your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It always amazes me what perfectly good things people throw away." - Ludevic, necro-alchemist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player shuffles up to three target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library. Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}: Target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Mindshrieker gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that card's converted mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{U}: Mirror-Mad Phantasm's owner shuffles it into his or her library. If that player does, he or she reveals cards from the top of that library until a card named Mirror-Mad Phantasm is revealed. The player puts that card onto the battlefield and all other cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The heron is the symbol of the archangel Avacyn. The fact that such spirits still fly gives the church hope that its founder may one day return.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever another creature dies, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even more than carrion, they crave the last words of the dying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for Zombie creature spells you cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let those idiot priests tremble! A new era in unlife begins here and now. Oglor, raise the lightning vane!" - Stitcher Geralf

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target exiled card with flashback you own to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What some call obsession, I call the quest for perfection."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Selhoff Occultist or another creature dies, target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The mist whispers to those who know it to be more than a mundane fog."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They call it "stitcher's anesthesia," a spell to deaden the senses while the mad doctors begin their grisly work.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Flashback {4}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The same magic that lets geists pass through our realm can force them out of it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Skaab Goliath, exile two creature cards from your graveyard. Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Three heads, six arms, and some armor grafts are better than . . . the normal numbers of those things." - Stitcher Geralf

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Skaab Ruinator, exile three creature cards from your graveyard. Flying You may cast Skaab Ruinator from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The church looks down on binding spirits into armor, but now I can look down on them." - Dierk, geistmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Stitched Drake, exile a creature card from your graveyard. Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best skaab are more powerful and more beautiful than the sum of their parts." - Stitcher Geralf

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}, {T}: Put a 2/2 blue Homunculus creature token onto the battlefield, then sacrifice a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oglor create life, Oglor take it away. Oglor god! . . . until Master return."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Sturmgeist's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. Whenever Sturmgeist deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card. Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Either I know just the spell I need, or I'm about to."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a Zombie you control would deal combat damage to a player, instead that player puts that many cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from his or her library, exile that card and put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Whenever a creature dealt damage by Abattoir Ghoul this turn dies, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death took his humanity but not his skill with the knife.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Altar's Reap, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The demons don't care if we mutter niceties and act out ceremonies. Just kill him." - Bishop Volpaig, servant of Griselbrand

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put thirteen 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens onto the battlefield tapped. Flashback {7}{B}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes death comes knocking. Sometimes it tears down the walls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch When Bitterheart Witch dies, you may search your library for a Curse card, put it onto the battlefield attached to target player, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, target player draws a card and loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He relishes the devotion of his Skirsdag puppets and their belief that it will earn them immortality.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Put a 2/2 black Vampire creature token with flying onto the battlefield. {B}: Transform Bloodline Keeper. Activate this ability only if you control five or more Vampires. // Flying Other Vampire creatures you control get +2/+2. {T}: Put a 2/2 black Vampire creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Sacrifice Brain Weevil: Target player discards two cards. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent loses 3 life. Flashback {5}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not just the wind. It's not all in your head. And it's definitely something to worry about.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Corpse Lunge, exile a creature card from your graveyard. Corpse Lunge deals damage equal to the exiled card's power to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Creatures enchanted player controls get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May you and all your kin waste and wither until your clan is no more!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player exiles two cards from his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first step to peace is to learn how to forget.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The crueler vampires' idea of free-range farming.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Diregraf Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At least this one still has arms and legs. Well, most of its legs." - Enslow, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The demon Griselbrand dared to stand against Avacyn, earning him the loathing of thousands and the admiration of a few.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is half the number of Zombies you control, rounded down.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With Thraben's army recalled to its city walls, outlying villages were left to fend for themselves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Falkenrath Noble or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I often think on how excited they must feel to be chosen as my prey."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand; or return two target Zombie cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The living are born small and weak. The dead rise ready to serve. The choice is obvious." - Gisa, ghoulcaller of Gavony

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ghoulraiser enters the battlefield, return a Zombie card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Come. Bring your brothers. Tonight, you feast on living flesh." - Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has intimidate. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She wanted to inspire terror wherever she went. The demons happily granted her wish.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature spells you cast cost {2} less to cast. Creatures you control get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They won't be winning any beauty pageants, but they'll do the trick." - Enslow, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Each player discards a card. [-2]: Target player sacrifices a creature. [-6]: Separate all permanents target player controls into two piles. That player sacrifices all permanents in the pile of his or her choice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lungs dried to parchment wheeze blasphemies within a cage of bleached bone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vampires of the Markov bloodline pride themselves on their exquisite taste in fashion, art, and "wine of the vein."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the chapel was dragged under, the bell in the tower rang until the murky depths forever silenced its toll.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens onto the battlefield. Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For a ghoul, every village is a buffet and every disaster is a reunion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morbid - When Morkrut Banshee enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let go your grudges, or risk wandering the bogs forever in a murderous rage." - Hildin, priest of Avacyn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Innistrad is a place where dreams invade the mind and mere shadows exact a terrible toll.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Morbid - At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, destroy target non-Demon creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avacyn has deserted you. I welcome your devotion in her stead."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its venom sacs are long gone, but its crushing strength is somehow greater than ever.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {2}{B}{B}. If you do, transform Screeching Bat. // At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {2}{B}{B}. If you do, transform Stalking Vampire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature. Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "{B}: Regenerate this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And then I realized we all have skeletons on the inside. Why wait until the bodies are dead to control them?" - Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morbid - {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Put a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thraben's pleas fall on deaf ears. Ours do not."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Stromkirk Patrol deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You'd best move along, human. Our palates are far less discerning than our master's."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Marella was delighted. The ball had attracted so many suitors for her daughter, including that handsome stranger. She wondered where the two were now . . . .

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kidnappers caught in Havengul are given two choices: languish in prison or become rat catchers. The smart ones go to prison.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unbreathing Horde enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other Zombie you control and each Zombie card in your graveyard. If Unbreathing Horde would be dealt damage, prevent that damage and remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All crave the Blessed Sleep. Few receive it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He listens to every heartbeat, deciding which one of hundreds he will stop.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target non-Vampire, non-Werewolf, non-Zombie creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not touch a drop. Not yet. I want to watch this so-called slayer's last crisis of faith." - Olivia Voldaren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another Human creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Village Cannibals.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some have endured the horrors of Innistrad by becoming the worst monsters of all.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is it hopeless? When wave upon wave of our dead return as mindless flesh-eaters to claw upon Thraben's walls? We're too busy cutting them down to indulge ourselves in such philosophical foppery." - Mikaeus, the Lunarch

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact. Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If there's anything a werewolf hates, it's a collar - especially Avacyn's Collar, the symbol of her church.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Ashmouth Hound blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Ashmouth Hound deals 1 damage to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its fiery paws make it easy to track, which is very useful when you want to go in exactly the opposite direction.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Balefire Dragon deals combat damage to a player, it deals that much damage to each creature that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If it comes for you, die boldly or die swiftly - for die you will.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blasphemous Act costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield. Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Holy places are no longer sanctuary from death, and death is no longer sanctuary from anything." - Thalia, Knight-Cathar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodcrazed Neonate attacks each turn if able. Whenever Bloodcrazed Neonate deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While elder vampires select their meals with care, the newly sired frenzy at the first whiff.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Brimstone Volley deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Morbid - Brimstone Volley deals 5 damage to that creature or player instead if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, Burning Vengeance deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mist is the geists' sorrow. Wind is their pain. Fire is their vengeance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, return an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard to your hand. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Charmbreaker Devils gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Crossway Vampire enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not flatter Fate. It did not guide you into my clutches tonight. That was all my doing."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Whenever a creature deals combat damage to enchanted player, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Innocent thorns can fill the air with your bloodscent. Don't stray from the path." - Elmut, crossway watcher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Creatures enchanted player controls attack each turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the moon rises and the bloodlust takes hold, nothing matters but the kill.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, Curse of the Pierced Heart deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May your veins weep, and may every vampire take notice." - Stensian curse

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards, then discard a card at random. Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her mind was quite gone, yet she spoke nothing but truth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Devil's Play deals X damage to target creature or player. Flashback {X}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A devil's hands are never idle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste Whenever Falkenrath Marauders deals combat damage to a player, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No slinking in the dark for them, no luring whispers. They claim their prey in the speed and glory of the hunt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample {1}{R}: Feral Ridgewolf gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wolves no longer hunt just to feed. They kill for sport, or for some madness behind their eyes." - Elmut, crossway watcher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and attacks each turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who only believe themselves infected with lycanthropy can be as dangerous as those who really are.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Geistflame deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Innistrad pyromancers find their best raw materials in the fury of the dead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Hanweir Watchkeep. // Bane of Hanweir attacks each turn if able. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Bane of Hanweir.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Harvest Pyre, exile X cards from your graveyard. Harvest Pyre deals X damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Corpses destroyed by fire form the most destructive geists.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{R}: Choose target creature or player, then put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.Heretic's Punishment deals damage to that creature or player equal to the highest converted mana cost among those cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Infernal Plunge, sacrifice a creature. Add {R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oh mighty Griselbrand, Scourge of the Heedless World, gladly I consume myself for thee!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0. At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Instigator Gang. // Trample Attacking creatures you control get +3/+0. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Wildblood Pack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. Into the Maw of Hell deals 13 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few entrances lead to where demons and devils lurk. Unfortunately, they occasionally open new ones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}: Kessig Wolf gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't be afraid when you hear the wolves howl. Be afraid when you don't hear them at all." - Saint Trogen, the Slayer

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Kruin Outlaw. // Double strike Each Werewolf you control can't be blocked except by two or more creatures. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Terror of Kruin Pass.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Night Revelers has haste as long as an opponent controls a Human.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vampires think of themselves as the indisputable nobility of Innistrad, able to do as they please. There are few who can prove them wrong.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures can't block this turn. Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shiny polished silver can ward off many creatures, but it attracts others.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Pitchburn Devils dies, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ingenuity of goblins, the depravity of demons, and the smarts of sheep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature dies, Rage Thrower deals 2 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some lament these haunted times, but I'm a geistflame-tank-half-full kind of person."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Vampire you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you're not having fun, what's the point of living forever?"

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: Devils are demons' unearthly desires made flesh. Let loose on the world, they satisfy their mad craving for destruction in a whirlwind of chaos.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rolling Temblor deals 2 damage to each creature without flying. Flashback {4}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When demons open a path to your front door, it's time to move.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scourge of Geier Reach gets +1/+1 for each creature your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stensian villagers mourned the loss of human life. Thraben vampire slayers mourned the loss of living wood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skirsdag Cultist deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Within blood is life. Within life is fire. Within fire is the path to our masters' glory!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Stromkirk Noble can't be blocked by Humans. Whenever Stromkirk Noble deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A responsible king walks among his subjects."

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains trample and haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can make you dance to my tune like a puppet, your very blood eager to obey." - Olivia Voldaren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vampire creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many peasants secretly admire vampires' glamour and elegance - until they witness a moment of pure bloodlust.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Village Ironsmith. // First strike At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Ironfang.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Living creatures seldom impress me. But I like this one." - Uta Falkenrath

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avacyn's protection is everywhere. From the holy church to the sacred glade, all that we see is under her blessed watch."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Boneyard Wurm's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only thing it likes more than discovering a pit of bones is adding to it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. Morbid - You may put that card onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your hand if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a permanent type. Return all cards of the chosen type from your graveyard to your hand. Flashback {5}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{G}: Darkthicket Wolf gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Werewolf slayers don't know for certain how werewolves are created. So they kill all the wolves, just to be safe.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Daybreak Ranger deals 2 damage to target creature with flying. At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Daybreak Ranger. // {R}, {T}: Nightfall Predator fights target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.) At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Nightfall Predator.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hopes and prayers can carry the same force as swords and torches.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control enter the battlefield as a copy of Essence of the Wild.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wander too far into the wild and it may take you for its own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Morbid - Festerhide Boar enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bury your dead deep. The boars are hungriest while the corpse is still warm." - Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

property.name: Rules
property.value: Werewolf creatures you control get +1/+0 and have trample. Sacrifice Full Moon's Rise: Regenerate all Werewolf creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some lycanthropes wish they could abandon their weak human shapes and revel in the power of the wolf.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Garruk Relentless has two or fewer loyalty counters on him, transform him. [0]: Garruk Relentless deals 3 damage to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to him. [0]: Put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield. // [+1]: Put a 1/1 black Wolf creature token with deathtouch onto the battlefield. [-1]: Sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. [-3]: Creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Gatstaf Shepherd. // Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Gatstaf Howler.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 2 life for each creature card in your graveyard. Flashback {2}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, put a slime counter on Gutter Grime, then put a green Ooze creature token onto the battlefield with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of slime counters on Gutter Grime."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Hamlet Captain attacks or blocks, other Human creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I would fear this fight, bloodsucker, were I alone."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morbid - When Hollowhenge Scavenger enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, you gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After werewolves slaughtered the citizenry of Hollowhenge, other creatures moved in.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Kessig Cagebreakers attacks, put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield tapped and attacking for each creature card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They put bars on these noble beasts and then wonder why werewolves target our towns."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the forest villages of Kessig, parents feed their children wormwood and other bitter herbs, hoping to make them less palatable to things that roam the night.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Lumberknot.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Animated by geists fused in its oak, it hungers for more life to add to its core.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return two cards at random from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Gavony wishing is taken as a sign of weakness, yet the wells usually brim with silver.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Human creatures you control get +1/+1. At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Mayor of Avabruck. // Other Werewolf and Wolf creatures you control get +1/+1. At the beginning of your end step, put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Howlpack Alpha.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Moldgraf Monstrosity dies, exile it, then return two creature cards at random from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The border between life and death is as thin as a layer of topsoil.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Transform all Humans. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures other than Werewolves and Wolves. (Only double-faced cards can be transformed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The land knows no difference between the graves of commoners and nobles.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stone and thought fade into ruin. Only the wind in the leaves will endure." - Tomb inscription

property.name: Rules
property.value: Orchard Spirit can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pick not the rotten fruit, but neither touch the best. Leave those as an offering for our unseen guests." - Radwick, farmer of Gatstaf

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an effect would put one or more tokens onto the battlefield under your control, it puts twice that many of those tokens onto the battlefield instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There will come a time when the only prey left will be each other." - Ulrich of Krallenhorde Pack

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You don't find many old werewolf hunters." - Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the remote corners of Kessig, protection is found in secret powers unknown to the Church of Avacyn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Morbid - Somberwald Spider enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stensian vampires encourage spiders near their manors so they can rob the webs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach onto the battlefield for each creature card in your graveyard. Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+4 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nobody's seen the Lady of Videns for years. Poor dear, no companions at all in that old castle." - Yonda of Gavony

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Splinterfright's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard. At the beginning of your upkeep, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. Flashback {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Visiting a shrine at the start of a journey makes the traveler more likely to finish it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {T}: Exchange your life total with Tree of Redemption's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The executioner's tree in Thraben Cathedral holds the power to absolve more than the souls of the hanged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Ulvenwald Mystics. // {G}: Regenerate Ulvenwald Primordials. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Ulvenwald Primordials.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Morbid - When Woodland Sleuth enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, return a creature card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whatever did this is near. Death reversion has not yet occurred. Be alert!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before you travel the woods of Kessig, first get permission from those who died trying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Evil Twin enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield except it gains "{U}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with the same name as this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You can always tell the evil one by the dagger he's sticking in you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Whenever Geist of Saint Traft attacks, put a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Grimgrin, Corpse-Born enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step. Sacrifice another creature: Untap Grimgrin and put a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever Grimgrin attacks, destroy target creature defending player controls, then put a +1/+1 counter on Grimgrin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{R}: Olivia Voldaren deals 1 damage to another target creature. That creature becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types. Put a +1/+1 counter on Olivia Voldaren. {3}{B}{B}: Gain control of target Vampire for as long as you control Olivia Voldaren.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature can't be blocked by Vampires or Zombies. Equipped creature has "{T}, Sacrifice Blazing Torch: Blazing Torch deals 2 damage to target creature or player." Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: Outside the safety of Thraben, there is little distinction between tool and weapon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Target player puts the bottom card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. If it's a creature card, you put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As if anyone needed another reason to avoid dark, dank cellars.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has flying. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the necro-alchemist, any puzzle can be solved with intelligence and harvested body parts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creepy Doll is indestructible. Whenever Creepy Doll deals combat damage to a creature, flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A child's porcelain doll went missing one night, as did a pair of kitchen shears and the town magistrate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +4/+2. Equip - Sacrifice a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It comes off as easily as your own skin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Galvanic Juggernaut attacks each turn if able. Galvanic Juggernaut doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever another creature dies, untap Galvanic Juggernaut.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Geistcatcher's Rig enters the battlefield, you may have it deal 4 damage to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rigs were outlawed except in Nephalia, where malign spirits are as plentiful as crazed inventors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Each player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bell's chime heralds the rise of the unhallowed from the grave and the fall of their victims into the earth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Target player exiles a card from his or her graveyard. If it's a creature card, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thanks to Havengul's thriving illegal market for corpses, the shovel that interred a body during the day is usually the same one digging it out at night.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a study counter on Grimoire of the Dead. {T}, Remove three study counters from Grimoire of the Dead and sacrifice it: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control. They're black Zombies in addition to their other colors and types.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Defender Manor Gargoyle is indestructible as long as it has defender. {1}: Until end of turn, Manor Gargoyle loses defender and gains flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing could break it but the fall.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+2 and has hexproof. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It hides the face and protects the soul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Creatures with flying your opponents control get -1/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Farmhands and priests mutter curses at the ragged thing; it unnerves more than just the crows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has first strike and gets +X/+0, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As sharp as its bearer's words of faith.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: Not everyone can have a sword of blessed silver. Not everyone needs one, either.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: Magical etchings turned a whittler's tool into a wolfhunter's weapon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rider set off into the eerie mist, swaddled in armor and laden with amulets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever equipped creature attacks, defending player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a land card. The creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each card revealed this way. That player puts the revealed cards into his or her graveyard. Equip {2}

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Witchbane Orb enters the battlefield, destroy all Curses attached to you. You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control, including Aura spells.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+0. Whenever equipped creature blocks or becomes blocked by a Vampire, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Clifftop Retreat enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Plains. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where cathars learn to fight not only demons and vampires, but ignorance as well.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {2}{G}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The protective wards of the church have weakened, and no one can tell us why. It's time to look to our own defenses." - Gregel, militia leader

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Ghost Quarter: Destroy target land. Its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle his or her library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hinterland Harbor enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or an Island. {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In places where the sea meets the trees, it's easy to forget the darkness that rules most of Innistrad.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Isolated Chapel enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or a Swamp. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not every church is a place of faith.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {X}{R}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +X/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a werewolf changes for the first time, that first howl is said to echo through the wilds till moonset.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {W}{U}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {1}{U}{B}, {T}: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some see a coastal disaster. I see a fully-stocked seagraf." - Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is the price of being last in the food chain. We must keep our places of beauty hidden away instead of displayed for all to see." - Hildin, priest of Avacyn

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {3}{B}{R}, {T}: Stensia Bloodhall deals 2 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The revelry ends when the supply of fresh ingenues runs dry.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sulfur Falls enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Mountain. {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Skirsdag cultists meet behind a waterfall's curtain and plot with demonic forces.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Woodland Cemetery enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Forest. {T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Farmers cut the trees and buried their dead. The dead rose up and killed the farmers. The trees grew back and strangled the dead.
